entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 6. POP 70%
